dataset_split.train: All seasons 2008_2009-2025_2026 with 10% target ratio (muscular only)
dataset_split.test: Season 2025_2026 with natural target ratio (muscular only, for evaluation only)

test_metrics.note: Test metrics on natural 2025-2026 are for monitoring only. This season was included in training, so these metrics reflect in-sample performance rather than true generalization.
